ygData.subject: Re: Thermal Cloak
ygData.msgSnippet: The Pie tin could be had in Freeport near the banks (those Gnomes). -Untos Gnomish Enchanter ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Pie tin could be had in Freeport near the banks (those Gnomes).
-Untos Gnomish Enchanter


>From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Thermal Cloak
>Date: Wed, 9 Jun 1999 10:02:20 -0700 (PDT)
>
>From: Zach Heaven <zheaven@...>
>
>
>I found it odd that the book mentions this:
>
>The flask of firewater attached to my belt ... metal
>rod in the Tattered Gnomish Cloak.
>
>Now, currently we need to know two things:
>
>1 - Which quest gives the tattered items? I heard
>there was one in the warriors guild. Which one?
>
>2 - Why does this mention "firewater attached to my
>belt". Do we need to add some sort of "belt" into the
>equation? Although this would be contradictory to a
>cloak for the most part, it WOULD make sense.
>
>------
>
>Where can I find store-bought pie tins? Or do I have
>to smith them myself? Everyone else wants money to do
>it (when I offer to buy the parts).
>
>I have this to make the compass:
>
>1 flask water
>1 static orb
>1 skewers
>1 cork
>
>I just need the pie tin. Damn is it hard to find
>someone who SELLS them.
>
>-Kryogen, Gnomish Wizard
